articles.title: Kim Jong Un Goes round Newly Built Unha Scientists Street
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Goes round Newly Built Unha Scientists Street
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, went round the newly built Unha Scientists Street.
					 He first looked round apartment houses for scientists.
					
					 Making the rounds of several flats in blocks No. 3 and 15, he was pleased that they were constructed to be impeccable and furniture in kitchens, living rooms and studies is very high in quality.
					
					 One more ardent desire of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il to provide the best living conditions to our scientists has been realized, he said, adding how pleased they would be if they had seen this street. We make a revolution to bring about such reality, he stressed.
					
					 Noting that the country thrives when making the revolution with a correct viewpoint and stand on science and talents, he emphasized that the party would consider it as a main objective of construction in the future to build dwelling houses and rest homes for personnel in the fields of science and education.
					
					 Then he moved to Unha Nursery.
					
					 Going round the wading pool, dining room and kitchen, he said that the parents who leave their children to be taken care of in the nursery would do their work free from any worry.
					
					 Looking round the 3rd education class, sleeping room, intelligence play room, combined play hall, indoor and outdoor wading pools, he noted with a broad smile that they were built well to suit children's minds and they would like them very much.
					
					 He also went round Unha Kindergarten No. 1.
					
					 He entered the playground covered with rubber mat and he was pleased that children might play to their heart's content and naughty children would not get hurt even when they fell down.
					
					 Going round a wading pool, Higher 2nd and 5th Classes, Junior 5th Class, dancing room and sleeping room and dining rooms, he praised the builders for constructing each room in such a delicate manner as to be liked by children and furnishing sleeping rooms with smart-looking beds.
					
					 At the newly built Unha Senior Secondary School, Junior Secondary School and Primary School he was satisfied to see the best educational conditions and environment provided to the students.
					
					 The education of the rising generation is an important work decisive of rise and fall of the country, he noted, adding that educators should become the roots in bringing up the future pillars of the country.
					
					 He went round the Unha Health Complex, restaurant, shops and parks in several places of the residential area.
					
					 Watching the roller skate site and parks having different playing apparatuses, he highly praised the builders for constructing a multi-purpose park where residents can enjoy both sports and cultural rest.
					
					 The builders worked such a miracle as completing a street in a matter of seven months, he said, extending thanks to them in the name of the Central Committee of the party.
					
					 He was accompanied by Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim In Sik, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Song, Hong Yong Chil and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Party and State Leaders
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Party and State Leaders
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, received a message of greeting from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC) and president of the People's Republic of China (PRC), Li Keqiang, premier of the State Council of the PRC, and Zhang Dejiang, chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress of the PRC, on Sunday.
					 The message said:
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to you and, through you, to the Workers' Party of Korea, the government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the CPC, the Chinese government and people on the occasion of the 65th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 Thanks to the founding of the DPRK 65 years ago from now the Korean people embarked upon the genuine road of building a socialist state and opened a new page in the Korean history.
					
					 The Korean people have achieved important successes in the cause of socialist construction under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 We sincerely wish the Korean people new and greater success in the economic and social development of the country in the future.
					
					 The Sino-Korean friendship personally provided and cultivated by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries is a precious treasure common to the two countries and peoples.
					
					 We will bring well-being to the peoples of the two countries and positively contribute to regional peace, stability and development by joining the Korean side in steadily consolidating and boosting the traditional friendly and cooperative relations in the spirit of inheriting the tradition, facing up to the future, boosting good neighborly relations and strengthening cooperation.
					
					 We wish the DPRK prosperity and the people's happiness.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Myanmar President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulatory Message from Myanmar President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Thein Sein, president of Myanmar, on Wednesday.
					 In the message the Myanmar president said that he was pleased to send warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the people of the DPRK on the occasion of the auspicious 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					 The president most sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the people of the DPRK steady progress and prosperity.
					
					 He sent highest regard to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Brazilian President
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Brazilian President Dilma Vana Rousseff on Thursday.
					 The Brazilian president in her message extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the people of the DPRK on behalf of the people of Brazil and on her own behalf on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK. She reiterated the stand of Brazil to boost the relations with the DPRK on the occasion.
					
					 She noted that she was very pleased with the recent improvement in the relations between the north and the south of Korea, expressing her conviction that the tension on the Korean Peninsula can be defused only through dialogue and by peaceful solution necessary for regional stability and development.
					
					 She sincerely wished Kim Jong Un happiness and the people of the DPRK prosperity and peace.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of Ethiopia
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from President of Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Girma Wolde-Giorgis, president of Ethiopia, on August 16.
					 The president in the message extended warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un, and through him, to the people and government of the DPRK on behalf of the people and government of Ethiopia and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					 He expressed his belief on this auspicious occasion that the bilateral friendly relations would grow strong in the mutual interests of the peoples of the two countries in the future.
					
					 He expressed the sincerest hope that Kim Jong Un would enjoy happiness and the friendly people of the DPRK always live in peace and achieve prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Congratulations from Russian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Overseas Compatriots
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter on Saturday from the members of the congratulatory groups, delegations and groups of overseas Koreans on a visit to the DPRK to participate in the celebrations of its 65th founding anniversary.
					 Noting the homeland, once eclipsed on the earth as it was not led by a wise leader and had weak national power, put an end to its distress-torn history and now emerged an invincible power in the world, the letter said this is a shining fruition of the outstanding leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The undying greatest exploits the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by providing a strong eternal foundation for the prosperity of the country and nation, dedicating themselves to them with patriotism all their lives, will shine long down through generations along with the history of the DPRK which will eternally prosper, it said, adding:
					
					 The undying exploits performed by the great Generalissimos in the nation-building are being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, another peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 During our stay in the homeland we came to cherish once again firm conviction that the goal for building an economic power is sure to be attained in the near future thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, a genius of creation and construction.
					
					 The letter evinced the firm resolution to hold as ever the great Generalissimos in high esteem as the eternal sun of the nation for all ages and glorify the worthy life on the road of Juche and patriotic devotion for the prosperity of the country by single-mindedly remaining true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks DPRK's Birthday
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture here Sunday to mark the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, officials of social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts, public health and media, labor innovators, working people in Pyongyang, delegations of overseas Koreans, visiting groups and compatriots staying in  the socialist homeland to mark the 65th birthday of the DPRK and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies and military attaches here.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a report.
					
					 The DPRK is the socialist state of Juche shining with the unique idea of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on nation-building and their leadership feats and serves as a powerful weapon guaranteeing the independent dignity and national prosperity of the Korean people, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung declared before the world the founding of the DPRK on Sept. 9, Juche 37 (1948) on the basis of a solid foundation for the building of an independent and sovereign state after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 The founding of the DPRK marked a great historic event as it paved a wide avenue for the Korean people to enjoy a free and happy life as masters of a state sovereignty with their genuine country, the first of its kind in the nation's history spanning five thousand years.
					
					 Under the outstanding and seasoned leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il the DPRK developed into a socialist power with invincible might under the uplifted revolutionary banner of Juche.
					
					 The DPRK is a genuine country for people which has successfully embodied Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's noble idea of believing in people as in Heaven.
					
					 They, regarding the above-said idea as the fundamental ideal of nation-building, made sure that the DPRK government strictly orientated all its lines, policies and activities to protecting the desires and interests of the people and providing them with rich material and cultural living conditions.
					
					 Under their tested and seasoned leadership the DPRK successfully pursued the policy of loving and believing the people, turning the whole country into a great, harmonious and united family.
					
					 The DPRK is an independent socialist power, strong in Juche character and national identity.
					
					 Regarding it as a basic principle to maintain the Juche character, national identity and independent line in nation-building and activities, Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il wisely led the work to thoroughly implement it.
					
					 The DPRK is an invincible power of Mt. Paektu emerging victorious and demonstrating its might by dint of Songun.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, pioneers and leaders of the Songun revolution, paid primary attention to military affairs in the whole period of leading the DPRK and directed big efforts to bolstering up the military capabilities of the country in every period and at every stage of the developing revolution.
					
					 Under their guidance the DPRK beat back the U.S. imperialist aggressors who invaded the less than two years old-people's country to nip it in the bud, honorably protecting its freedom and independence, and achieved victories one after another in the confrontation with the imperialists, firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and gains of the revolution.
					
					 Their outstanding idea and energetic leadership provided important guidelines such as the three charters for national reunification and a powerful driving force for the reunification movement and ushered in the June 15 era of reunification and a rosy future of national reunification.
					
					 The DPRK is now greeting a new heyday of building a thriving socialist nation under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is the noble duty of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal leaders of the revolution, eternal President of the DPRK and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission and achieve the historic cause of building a thriving socialist nation and accomplishing national reunification under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter called on all service personnel and people to bring about a fresh surge in the on-going general advance for building an economic power and improving the standard of people's living by displaying indomitable spirit and build more structures of eternal value by dint of army-people coordinated operations and thus make the shouts of hurrah for socialism and happy laughter of people resound forth across the country.

articles.title: Extravaganza "Arirang" Marks DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
Extravaganza "Arirang" Marks DPRK's Birthday
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang," Kim Il Sung Prize winner, was given at May Day Stadium here on Sunday in celebration of the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party,  state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, persons of merit, working people in Pyongyang, delegations of Koreans abroad and overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here, military attaches and their wives and foreign guests were present on invitation.
					
					 Extravaganza "Arirang" made a grand epic representation of the century-long history of Juche Korea in which the DPRK has won victories and exalted its honor through gigantic creation and epoch-making changes under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the immensely bright future of Kim Jong Un era. 
					
					 The performers highly praised the immortal feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by building a socialist power centered on the popular masses, the first of its kind in the history of the Korean nation spanning five thousand years, and providing a solid foundation for the prosperity of the generations to come.
					
					 The performance was a perfect combination of beautiful rhythms, dynamic gymnastics, rich national emotion, and refined artistic representation, ever-changing background, splendid stage decor and peculiar illuminations presented in vast three-dimensional space. It truthfully represented the pride of the Korean people bringing about the renaissance of socialist civilization and building on this land the best thriving nation to be envied by the world people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Overseas Compatriots
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Overseas Compatriots
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter on Saturday from the members of the congratulatory groups, delegations and groups of overseas Koreans on a visit to the DPRK to participate in the celebrations of its 65th founding anniversary.
					 Noting the homeland, once eclipsed on the earth as it was not led by a wise leader and had weak national power, put an end to its distress-torn history and now emerged an invincible power in the world, the letter said this is a shining fruition of the outstanding leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Delegations and Delegate of Juche Idea Study Groups
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gifts from Delegations and Delegate of Juche Idea Study Groups
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from the delegations and delegate of groups for the study of the Juche idea in various countries on the occasion of the 65th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They included the delegation of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea led by its General Secretary Sheikh Rafiqul Islam Bablu, the delegation of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development led by N. Sarantuya, member of its Leadership Council, the delegation of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics led by its Chairman Sonkori Baroti, the delegation of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy led by its Chairman M. Jahangir Khan and Garth Lawrence Shelton, chairman of the South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The gifts were handed to officials concerned separately.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from foreign personages on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the DPRK. They included Kazuyoshi Hishiki, professor emeritus of Hiroshima Shudo University of Japan, the mayor of Deleg City of Ecuador and Ibrahim Mantu, chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Delegations
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Japanese Delegations
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the delegations of the Japanese Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Japanese Society for Consultation on Korean Affairs and the Tochigi Prefectural Citizens Council for Japan-DPRK Friendship on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 They were handed to officials concerned by head of the delegation Fujio Hanawa, secretary general of the Japanese National Liaison Council of the societies, head of the delegation Tomoyoshi Kimura and head of the delegation Sinta Tanaka on Saturday and Sunday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Chinese embassy here, a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the 65th birthday of the DPRK, a delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China, a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. and Jong Il Sim, Korean in Russia, and other overseas compatriots visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Sunday on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 On the same day, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist Democratic National Front and its staff members also laid a floral basket before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy in Phnom Penh from Cambodian King and Great Queen
articles.content:
Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy in Phnom Penh from Cambodian King and Great Queen
						
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh to mark the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 Authorized by the king and the great queen, the delegation of the Ministry of the Royal Palace of the Cambodian government led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, visited the DPRK embassy on September 2 to lay floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il there. 
					
					 The deputy prime minister said that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between Cambodia and the DPRK would last forever.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Martyrs and Fallen Fighters' Cemeteries
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Martyrs and Fallen Fighters' Cemeteries 
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Sunday on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 Seen standing at the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Attending the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, vice-premiers of the Cabinet, a chairperson of the friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and Pyongyangites.
					
					 Laid before the wreath-laying stand of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong were wreaths in the name of the C.C., the WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Also placed before the wreath-laying stand of the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery was a wreath in the joint name of the C.C., the WPK, the Presidium of the DPRK SPA and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Laid before the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" of the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery was a wreath in the joint name of the C.C., the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					 Placed before the cemeteries were wreaths in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the KPISF, scientific, educational, public health and media institutions and party and power organs, factories and farms, etc. in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs.
					
					 They looked round the cemeteries.

articles.title: Foreign Guests and Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 They include members of delegations and delegates of the groups for the study of the Juche idea of different countries, a delegation of the Lao Federation of Trade Unions, and delegation of the Kyodo News of Japan.
					
					 They paid in the humblest reverence tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il who performed great feats before the era and history.
					
					 They paid homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They looked round the halls where the orders they received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their life. 
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book. 
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea wrote in the visitor's book that he extends eternal glory to the great Generalissimos of the Korean people.
					
					 The head of the Lao Federation of Trade Unions wrote that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be remembered for all ages.

articles.title: Meeting of Foreign Crewmen Marks Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Meeting of Foreign Crewmen Marks Birthday of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Chongjin Port in North Hamgyong Province on Sunday to mark the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung in Chongjin City and paid tribute to him.
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of the Sierra Leon-flagged ship Chun Yang-8.
					
					 Speakers said at the meeting that after Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK, it proudly emerged an independent and sovereign state on the world arena and the Korean people were provided with a strong guarantee for power to achieve eternal prosperity.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il pursued the original Songun politics, firmly protecting socialist Korea and providing a solid foundation for building a thriving nation, they noted, adding:
					
					 The plan of building a thriving nation laid down by Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and Kim Jong Il, peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun, will be successfully accomplished under the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for End to U.S. Military Presence in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for End to U.S. Military Presence in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday carries an article on the lapse of 68 years since the U.S. imperialists put south Korea under their military occupation.
					 The article says that the Korean nation, which has the proud  history spanning five thousand years, has suffered the tragedy and disgrace of division for more than half a century due to the U.S. imperialists' occupation of south Korea on Sept. 8, 1945. 
					
					 It was their real intention to turn south Korea into a military appendage for their policy of aggression by reducing it to their colony and dividing the Korean Peninsula into two, it notes, and goes on.
					
					 The U.S. does not want to see detente on the peninsula at all. It is going in the direction of deliberately straining the situation as the international community is more vocally querying the reason why the U.S. forces will stay in south Korea if the tension on the Korean Peninsula will be defused.
					
					 The U.S. used to claim that if its forces withdraw from south Korea, a war breaks out on the Korean Peninsula right now but the situation on the peninsula has been strained to extremes due to the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea.
					
					 It is none other than south Korea under U.S. military occupation where dangerous war scenarios have openly been declared and saber-rattling has been staged with huge forces enough to fight a total war involved.
					
					 This clearly proves once again the true colors of the U.S. imperialists as the arch criminal bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. forces' presence in south Korea is a source of a war on the peninsula and the root cause of threatening and wrecking peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 U.S. forces' withdrawal from south Korea would mean the removal of the most dangerous hotbed of a war from the world.
					
					 The U.S. forces should withdraw from south Korea as early as possible for peace and security in the peninsula and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Independence of Country and Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Independence of Country and Nation
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Only when all the countries firmly adhere to the principle of independence in the international relations, is it possible to form the relations of equality based on the independence, cooperation, mutual benefit and non-interference in internal affairs, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The independence of the country and the nation should serve as a basis of strong international relations because this makes it possible to meet the intrinsic requirements of the country and the nation and fairly settle the international issues in conformity with the interests and demands of all countries and nations.
					
					 Independence serves as a fundamental principle to define the existence and dignity of an independent and sovereign state and guarantee its progress and prosperity.
					
					 There are big and small countries in the world. But there are no superior and inferior country and the nation to dominate others and the one to be dominated. All countries and nations are completely equal and independent as equal members of the international community.
					
					 Big powers should not be allowed to pursue such old way of thinking and practices dating back to the Cold War as claiming special privileges and arbitrary practices in the settlement of international issues. 
					
					 It is the consistent stand and policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and government of the DPRK to adhere to independence.
					
					 It is also the consistent policy of the WPK and government of the DPRK to improve and develop the relations with those countries which respect the sovereignty of the DPRK, irrespective of ideology and ism, political view and religious belief.
					
					 The DPRK has developed friendly and cooperative relations with many countries of the world, enforcing an independent foreign policy.
					
					It will improve the relations and develop cooperation and exchange with those countries which respect the sovereignty of the DPRK and develop the friendly and cooperative relations with it although they were in the hostile relationship with it in the past.
					
					 The DPRK will make positive efforts to develop the fair international relations based on the independence in the future, too.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Escalating Confrontation with Compatriots
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Escalating Confrontation with Compatriots
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative forces including the Intelligence Service (IS) which fabricated what they call the case of "the united underground organization in the eastern part of Kyonggi Province" are running the whole gamut of plots to bring such alarming charges as "a plotted rebellion" "violation of Security Law" to the persons concerned of the Unified Progressive Party and deliberately link them with the north.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary terms this another unpardonable confrontation farce against the trend of times towards democracy of the south Korean society and dialogue and the improved relations between the north and the south.
					
					 The commentary notes:
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces are getting frantic with the suppression of those concerned of the Unified Progressive Party because this party has taken the lead in opposing the revival of "yusin" dictatorship and demanding the disorganization of the IS.
					
					 Their actions were prompted by their own intentions, not by someone's instructions or pressure. They are in line with the call of people of various social circles in south Korea for a thorough-going investigation into the "case of IS's interference in the election".
					
					 The south Korean authorities' attempt to link the case with the north is a blatant challenge to the desire of the public for achieving reunification through alliance with the north and an unpardonable mockery of the sincere efforts of the north, their dialogue partner.
					
					 They are paying lip-service to "dialogue" and intensifying the suppression of people, raising a hue and cry over "the case of plotted rebellion" and "the forces linked with the north to bring down the social system in the south." This can not but be construed otherwise than a deliberate and premeditated act of those forces opposed to detente and the improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The south Korean regime should bear in mind that plots, intrigues and fascist violence can never work in this bright world.

articles.title: S. Korean IS Accused of Suppressing Opposition Party
articles.content:
S. Korean IS Accused of Suppressing Opposition Party
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Federation of South Koreans in Japan for Democracy and Unification released a statement titled "We strongly denounce the Intelligence Service (IS) for suppressing the Unified Progressive Party (UPP) under the pretext of security" on September 3.
					 The statement accused the south Korean IS and prosecution of committing such unprecedented violence as forcibly searching the houses and offices of a lawmaker from the UPP and others concerned and arresting three persons on the charge of a plotted rebellion on August 28.
					
					 The above-said case is politically-motivated terrorism as it was fabricated by the south Korean regime to tide over its ruling crisis and maintain its power and totally violate democracy by reviving the "yusin" dictatorship, it held, and continued:
					
					 It is a repressive campaign targeting the progressive democratic forces leading the actions for probing the truth about the case of the IS's interference in the election.
					
					 The IS should be dismantled as it is keen on interfering in politics and deliberately opening false information to public.
					
					 The federation will never remain an onlooker to the south Korean regime and the IS's suppression and join in the campaign for probing the truth about the IS's case and punishing its main culprit, it stressed.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Seoul branch of the Road to Reunification of south Korea was inaugurated with due ceremony in Yongdungpho, Seoul on Sept. 4.
					 At the ceremony the organization said that after the announcement of its future working plan, it would actively solidarize with reunification organizations in Seoul and take active part in the work for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Mexican Organization Introduces DPRK
articles.content:
Mexican Organization Introduces DPRK
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism published a bulletin titled "DPRK, country of Juche" on August 27 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 The DPRK is a socialist power guided by the Juche idea where the people are its master.
					
					 The party and government of the DPRK shape all lines and policies based on the people-centered Juche idea and pursue them in line with the requirements and interests of the people.
					
					 It was a motto of President Kim Il Sung, founding father of socialist Korea, to believe in people as in Heaven.
					
					 The President declared before the whole world on Sept. 9, 1948 the founding of the DPRK which represents and protects the interests of the working masses including workers and farmers.
					
					 The 65 years covered by the DPRK was the period in which it has invariably implemented its programme.
					
					 Highly praising Generalissimo Kim Il Sung for his exploits in the nation-building and Generalissimo Kim Jong Il for his Songun leadership feats, the bulletin said that the DPRK, the homeland of Juche, will prosper forever thanks to the absolute support of the people.
					
					 It also carried a photo showing the panoramic view of Pyongyang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Carried by Nigerian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Carried by Nigerian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was carried by the Nigerian paper Nigerian Observer on September 2.  The talk was carried by Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on August 25, the Day of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in China
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" was published in booklet by a printing house in Dandong, China,  on September 3.
					 The work, published on April 27, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in land management. It also indicates the general orientation and tasks for face-lifting the land of the country as befitting a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Website of Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Website of Peruvian Organization 
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship on Sept. 3 posted on its website supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution".  The talk was carried in Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on August 25, the Day of Songun.
